argument.name: htmlText
argument.description: Text to treat as HTML in the context of a report.

argument.name: UTF8
argument.description: If set to true, html with non-ascii characters will be assumed to be utf8 encoded.

page.description: For use in a calculated field in a Report, Label or Letter layout. Allows you to render HTML when the report is printed. Example usage - in a report to print an international currency symbol. If you print to PDF be sure to set PDF options to allow 'Multilingual support'.
